alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Rutland; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 3:23PM EST until February 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Western Essex County in northern New York, the Northeast Kingdom, and portions of central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of precipitation will continue through this evening across the Advisory area. Areas above 1500 ft will see the greatest snow and ice accumulations. The wintry mix will transition into mainly rain towards late evening as temperatures warm above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Rutland; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Windsor
